Here’s a good example: two young scientists under the presence of the Courthouse Towers in Arches National Park.

We can be sure that they spent some amount of time in awe of the giant sandstone walls,

but here in this photo they’re enthralled with the sand that’s just been re-washed by recent rain.

There’s this giant formation of sandstone looming above these kids in the desert,

and they’re happily playing in the sand.

This is ridiculous.

Or is it?
